text:
I just switched companies but will respond for <http://ClickUp.com|ClickUp.com> (did content there for year+)

• What's the short version (1-5 sentences) of your strategy?
To rank on high-converting keywords (lists and "alternatives" were good for us
• What does your team look like, and how do you communicate about content with other teams internally?
Super small company so it was a small team! I did most of the writing & keyword research. Someone helped with formatting & design
• How do you measure? (not just what number, but how you decided on that number and who had to agree to it)
Tracked organic traffic growth, lead conversions from posts and SERP positioning
